title: New: Jesiah – Babylon
body:
Disclaimer: I’m a bit of a sucker for Vampire Weekend.

This new track from LA’s **Jesiah** has more than a hint of Ezra Koenig & co. to it, but that doesn’t prevent it being rather brilliant. It’s dashingly romantic, and deceivingly addictive. Check out Babylon below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
